name: INSearchForMediaIntentHandling
desc: The interface that handles media search requests.

items.name: func resolveMediaItems(for: INSearchForMediaIntent, with: ([INSearchForMediaMediaItemResolutionResult]) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the media items for which to search.

items.name: func confirm(intent: INSearchForMediaIntent, completion: (INSearchForMediaIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Confirms the details of the media search request.
